properties.entry: SELECT swi.* , srp.NAME AS REAL_NAME, srp.IMAGE_URL, srp.REAL_SKU, srp.ID as REAL_ID FROM sc_real_product srp , sc_warehouse_inventory swi WHERE swi.inventory_type = 2 AND swi.warehouse_id = '{@#warehouseId#}' AND swi.REAL_PRODUCT_ID =srp.ID

SELECT swi.* , srp.NAME AS REAL_NAME, srp.IMAGE_URL, srp.REAL_SKU, srp.ID as REAL_ID FROM sc_real_product_rel srpr, sc_real_product srp , sc_amazon_account_product saap left join sc_warehouse_inventory swi on swi.listing_sku =saap.sku and swi.account_id = saap.account_id and swi.warehouse_id = '{@#warehouseId#}' where 1=1 and saap.account_id = srpr.account_id and saap.sku = srpr.sku and srpr.real_id = srp.id and saap.account_id = '{@#accountId#}' {@ and swi.quantity >0 and #includeOnly# = #includeOnly# } order by srp.id

SELECT swip.*, srp.NAME AS REAL_NAME, srp.IMAGE_URL, srp.REAL_SKU, (select FC_SKU from sc_amazon_account_product saap where saap.account_id = swip.account_id and saap.sku = swip.listing_sku) as FN_SKU FROM sc_warehouse_in_product swip , sc_real_product srp WHERE swip.REAL_ID =srp.ID and swip.in_id='{@#inId#}'
INSERT INTO sc_warehouse_in_product (ID, IN_ID, REAL_ID, LISTING_SKU, QUANTITY, ACCOUNT_ID ) VALUES ('{@#id#}', '{@#inId#}', '{@#realId#}', '{@#listingSku#}', '{@#quantity#}', '{@#accountId#}' )
